description: This file is a shell script used to manage IPv4 interface instances, handling static IP configuration, instance resynchronization, and integration with system events and services.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Stub function for starting the service.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stub function for stopping the service.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes the service, checks configuration status.

methods.name: handle_l2_status
methods.description: Handles the status of L2 interface instances and updates IPv4 configurations accordingly.

methods.name: apply_config
methods.description: Applies IPv4 static configuration to the specified interface instance.

methods.name: remove_config
methods.description: Removes IPv4 configuration from the specified interface instance.

methods.name: load_static_l3
methods.description: Loads static IPv4 configuration parameters from PSM for a given instance.

methods.name: teardown_instance
methods.description: Tears down a specific IPv4 instance, removing configurations and updates.

methods.name: resync_all_instances
methods.description: Synchronizes all IPv4 instances with their persistent configurations.

methods.name: resync_instance
methods.description: Resynchronizes an individual IPv4 instance based on persistent configuration.

methods.name: sync_tsip
methods.description: Synchronizes true static IP configuration from PSM to system.

methods.name: sync_tsip_asn
methods.description: Synchronizes additional/subnet static IP configurations from PSM.

methods.name: resync_tsip
methods.description: Resyncs true static IP configuration, replacing previous configurations.

methods.name: resync_tsip_asn
methods.description: Resyncs additional/subnet static IP configuration from PSM.

methods.name: remove_tsip_config
methods.description: Removes true static IP configurations from the system.
